data.title: Feature: Better Time

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body: This switches Time to use a [StopWatch](http://dlang.org/phobos/std_datetime.html#StopWatch) for timing, which is much more precise. This gives us more accurate framerates, and non-zero deltas on every frame.

data.title: Time fails to update between frames on fast machines

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body:
Time in D seems to have some issues incrementing quickly enough.

Here's output of Time.deltaTime in hnsecs:

```
[INFO]    9994
[INFO]    0
[INFO]    10002
[INFO]    0
[INFO]    0
[INFO]    10005
```

data.title: Add Up, Right, and Forward Vectors

milestone.title: Version 0.7.0
milestone.description:
## Beta Release - Imagine RIT Build

The game will reach Beta with this milestone.

data.body:
We should have an Up Right and Forward vector based on a given transformation, for uses with things like cameras, etc.

This could probably go in Transform and be based on the rotation, or maybe should go into our fork of gl3n?

data.title: Cannot assign multiple keys to same input

milestone.title: Version 0.7.0
milestone.description:
## Beta Release - Imagine RIT Build

The game will reach Beta with this milestone.

data.body:
Right now Dash uses the last key in the list, but ideally all the keys listed should work.

``` yaml
LookUp:
    - !Keyboard I
    - !Keyboard Up
```

data.title: Feature: Engine State
data.body: Closes #120.

data.title: Convert ShaderUniform Locations from Associative Array to Variables

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body: Gonna do some mixin magic.  It'll be great.  Trust me.

data.title: Convert Uniforms to Shared Uniform Blocks where possible
data.body: Not to be mistaken for the Shared keyword in D, GL supports a global gpu uniform location that all shader programs can use the a uniform without needing to rebind it each time the shader changes.

data.title: Change GameState to EngineState, Update Flags

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body: We're modifying the internal state enum to only consist of three states: Running, Exit, Reset. This issue also consists of exposing flags to the game so devs may control when engine components get updated.

data.title: Fix Config.tryGet to parse lists

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body:
In YAML-land the following snippet is legal, but Config.tryGet breaks when attempting to read either of the nodes.

``` yaml
men: [John Smith, Bill Jones]
women:
  - Mary Smith
  - Susan Williams
```

data.title: Feature: Animation system
data.body: Merge animation system into develop.

milestone.description: At this point, Dash should be usable by a newcomer to game development who stumbles across the engine. This includes having solid documentation.

data.body: Awesomium should be 100% out!

data.title: Integrate Speed as an Engine Component
Linux. Runtime fails
data.body:
While building under linux platform one should note:
- You need latest version of `freeimage`:
  If you use repo version of freeimage (my was 3.10.0, but 3.16 required) or you will get "cannot load `Has_Pixels` symbol" error. Note: there is idea to catch derelict load exceptions for unused new features.
- You need latest `assimp` version:
  I got segfault while initializing, here core dump:

```
#0  0x00000000005d2e35 in components.assets.AssetManager.initialize() (this=0x7ffff7ed4fc0) at source/components/assets.d:66
#1  0x00000000005bc3b0 in core.dgame.DGame.start() (this=0x7ffff7ed4f80) at source/core/dgame.d:198
#2  0x00000000005bbc5c in core.dgame.DGame.run() (this=0x7ffff7ed4f80) at source/core/dgame.d:53
#3  0x00000000005ba324 in D main () at ../Dash/source/app.d:23
#4  0x000000000067b824 in rt.dmain2._d_run_main() ()
#5  0x000000000067b77e in rt.dmain2._d_run_main() ()
#6  0x000000000067b7e4 in rt.dmain2._d_run_main() ()
#7  0x000000000067b77e in rt.dmain2._d_run_main() ()
#8  0x000000000067b6ff in _d_run_main ()
#9  0x00000000005ba34d in main ()
```

I found that `aiImportFile` returns `null` at `source/components/assets.d:60`. There is lack of enforce check for successful load and `assimp` support for `.fbx` format.

And finally, some .yml files have several objects and game fails in initialization phase with:

```
[INFO]    Initializing...
[INFO]    Graphics initialization:
[INFO]    ../Shaders does not exist.
[INFO]    Graphics init time: 422 ms, 959 s, and 4 hnsecs
[INFO]    Assets initialization:
[INFO]    Assets init time: 35 secs, 196 ms, and 246 s
dyaml.node.NodeException@../../../.dub/packages/dyaml-master/source/dyaml/node.d(1815): Indexing a sequence with a non-integral type.
Node at: line 1,column 1
----------------
./sample-dash-game(ref @trusted dyaml.node.Node dyaml.node.Node.opIndex!(immutable(char)[]).opIndex(immutable(char)[])+0x79) [0x5ab9b1]
./sample-dash-game(shared(void function()) core.prefabs.PrefabManager.initialize+0x181) [0x5c02b9]
./sample-dash-game(shared(void function()) core.dgame.DGame.start+0x1a3) [0x5bd0bb]
./sample-dash-game(shared(void function()) core.dgame.DGame.run+0x6c) [0x5bc8fc]
./sample-dash-game(_Dmain+0x34) [0x5bafc4]
./sample-dash-game(void rt.dmain2._d_run_main(int, char**, extern (C) int function(char[][])*).runAll().void __lambda1()+0x18) [0x67cf58]
./sample-dash-game(void rt.dmain2._d_run_main(int, char**, extern (C) int function(char[][])*).tryExec(scope void delegate())+0x2a) [0x67ceb2]
./sample-dash-game(void rt.dmain2._d_run_main(int, char**, extern (C) int function(char[][])*).runAll()+0x30) [0x67cf18]
./sample-dash-game(void rt.dmain2._d_run_main(int, char**, extern (C) int function(char[][])*).tryExec(scope void delegate())+0x2a) [0x67ceb2]
./sample-dash-game(_d_run_main+0x1a3) [0x67ce33]
./sample-dash-game(main+0x25) [0x5bafed]
```

fd406f0 commit fixes the problem.
# P.S.

There is useful functions for C<->D string conversions:
- std.string.toStringz 
- custom made fromStringz

data.title: Feature: IDirtyable/Dirty Properties

milestone.title: Version 0.5.0
milestone.description:
## Break Week and Bug Fixes

This milestone falls on GDC week and spring break. We don't plan on adding any major features for this milestone.

data.body:
This implements a version of dirtyness that is maintainable and easy to use. The responsibility to decide what is dirty lays with the implementer, and thus allows for more general code.

See [feature/IDirtyable in Sample-Dash-Game](https://github.com/Circular-Studios/Sample-Dash-Game/tree/feature/IDirtyable).

data.title: Feature: Yaml Load Revamp

milestone.title: Version 0.5.0
milestone.description:
## Break Week and Bug Fixes

This milestone falls on GDC week and spring break. We don't plan on adding any major features for this milestone.

data.body:
Turns out YAML has [documents](http://dyaml.alwaysdata.net/static/html/doc_0.4/tutorials/yaml_syntax.html#documents), so why not use them? This also removes functions nested in the Config class.

Requires #107.

See [feature/YamlLoadRevamp in Sampe-Dash-Game](https://github.com/Circular-Studios/Sample-Dash-Game/tree/feature/YamlLoadRevamp).

data.title: Feature: Task Scheduling

milestone.title: Version 0.5.0
milestone.description:
## Break Week and Bug Fixes

This milestone falls on GDC week and spring break. We don't plan on adding any major features for this milestone.

data.body:
Allows you to schedule tasks to execute over a given period of time, or until it returns true.

Closes #102.

Relies on #103.

See [feature/TaskScheduling on Sample Dash Game](https://github.com/Circular-Studios/Sample-Dash-Game/tree/feature/TaskScheduling).

data.title: Convert GameObjectCollection to Scenes

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body: We really need a better way to store GameObjects, and I think Scenes are the best way to enforce that related objects are stored together.

data.title: Feature: YAML Fields

milestone.title: Version 0.5.0
milestone.description:
## Break Week and Bug Fixes

This milestone falls on GDC week and spring break. We don't plan on adding any major features for this milestone.

data.body:
This allow for fields in GameObject's children to receive variables from YAML for initializing.

Naming for `GameObjectInit` is debatable.

See [feature/YAMLFields in Sample Dash Game](https://github.com/Circular-Studios/Sample-Dash-Game/tree/feature/YAMLVariables) for supporting code.

Also closes #101.

data.title: Hotfix: Win32 Missing
data.body:
This adds win32 as a subtree and not a submodule so all files are in our repo.

**DO NOT MERGE FROM GITHUB**
This will put the documentation in `develop`, which we don't want.
